entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow or ice pellets beginning this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of snow or ice pellets early in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
